00076     void load_header(int sd, const uint8_t *buf, size_t len) {
00077       header.decode(&buf, &len);
00078       if (header.gid != 0)
00079         thread_group = ((uint64_t)sd << 32) | header.gid;
00080       else
00081         thread_group = 0;
00082     }
